blueprint.metaphor: Together you function like a tidepool laboratory-brimming with discoveries when you let curiosity stay gentle.
blueprint.balanceOverview: The bond hums when shared structure makes room for surprise; collapse happens when both default to strategic quiet.
contrastHighlights: Alex leads with quicker cognitive pivots
Jordan anchors through steady sensory referencing

sharedField.field: The bond climate feels like a warm draft moving through an open studio-ideas drift in if you keep the windows cracked.
sharedField.map: Check where this breeze shows up between you; name it together before deciding what it means.

snapshot.summary: Shared circuitry is currently weighted toward collaborative problem-solving with a latent need for co-regulated rest.
keyShifts: Mutual curiosity up 6% after yesterday's sync
focusAreas: Schedule a micro-pause before moving into decision mode
Let Jordan set the closing ritual tonight

frictionZones.name: Planning Cadence
frictionZones.field: There is a subtle handoff hesitation when the conversation shifts from ideation into concrete plans.
frictionZones.map: If you notice a pause stretch too long, ask whose nervous system wants the mic next.
frictionZones.supportCue: Use a 3-minute co-regulation check before committing to timelines.

frictionZones.name: Emotional Translation
frictionZones.field: Meaning sometimes travels through different channels; one of you speaks in images while the other waits for thesis statements.
frictionZones.voice: Share a moment when this FIELD is live and I'll reflect the texture you're both tracking.
frictionZones.supportCue: Invite a metaphor plus a body cue before moving into solutions.

integration.weave: Your bond stays clearest when experiments and rest stop competing; today's weather favors tandem tinkering followed by a shared landing pad.
integration.invitation: Notice which micro-ritual keeps both nervous systems within range, then extend it into tomorrow's opening move.
